title: Noob Gigachad: Parkour Tricks Challenge
description: Noob Gigachad: Parkour Tricks Challenge is a fun 2D casual parkour game in the Noob universe! After getting expelled from Monster School, Noob is transformed into Gigachad by Herobrine, giving him new powers and challenges. Your mission is simpleâ€”you need to run, leap, and pull off impressive parkour tricks as you race toward victory. Collect diamonds along the way to unlock a variety of cool new skins, and carefully navigate through tricky obstacles to reach the portal without falling into the holes.
